fields.name: ConfirmationOfAceSubmission
fields.fieldText:
Confirmation of Submission

Thank you for submitting a new AWS request. This will be automatically submitted to AWS, and if you have any questions please reach out to Nick Wein in #partnerships.

fields.name: Associated_Partner_Relationships_Current
fields.fieldText:
Please select the Partner you would like to associate with the opportunity.


Double-check that the partner relationship type is correct.


If the Partner you want to select isn't on the list, please click "Need Support".

fields.name: need_partner_reg_help
fields.fieldText: If you are unsure of the Partner and/or Partner Type you would like to register, please select "Need Support" below.

fields.name: ConfirmCustomerDetailsHeader
fields.fieldText:
Confirm Customer Details

Please review and confirm the customer details for your submission from the Account.

fields.name: ConfirmNameandWebsite
fields.fieldText:
Account Name: {!Get_Related_Account.Name}

Website: {!Get_Related_Account.Website}

(note: If any of the above is incorrect, please update the Account and restart this form)

fields.name: Confirm_Partner_missing
fields.fieldText:
It looks like there is already a Partner Lead associated with this opportunity. Please review this table to confirm that it is correct:

{!Partner_Relationship}

fields.name: Incorrect_Partner_Lead_Associated
fields.fieldText: Incorrect Partner Lead Associated

fields.name: ConfirmProjectDetailsHeader
fields.fieldText:
Confirm Project Details

Please supply some additional information about the project you're working on with your prospect.

fields.name: EstimatedARR
fields.fieldText:
Opportunity Subtype: {!recordId.Subtype__c}

Estimated ARR: {!recordId.Forecast_Total_AR__c}

Target Close Date: {!recordId.CloseDate}

(note: if the above is inaccurate, please first review and update the opportunity, and restart this form)

fields.name: aws_sales_act_def
fields.fieldText:
Sales Activity Definitions and Selection Help:

  • Initial discussions with customer
    • AE has engaged with the customer and has done initial discovery.
  • Customer has shown interest in Retool
    • Customer has indicated to the AE that Retool could be a good fit for their use case(s).
  • Conducted POC/Demo
    • AE and SE team have conducted a live product demo or POC for the customer to demonstrate product functionality and applicability to the customer's use case(s).
  • Evaluation/Planning Stage
    • AE and SE have discussed all relevant information with the customer related to the product and/or business use case(s). The customer is in the process of evaluating Retool for their use case(s) or planning how they might implement the solution in practice.
  • Agreed on Solution to Business Problem
    • Renewals or Conversions from traditional payment to AWS.
  • Finalized Deployment Need
    • The customer has clearly outlined what is needed (e.g. technical resources, services, etc.) to move forward with a Retool deployment.

fields.name: Sales_Activity
fields.fieldText: Sales Activity

fields.name: Partner_Need_from_AWS
fields.fieldText: Would you like AWS's help with a co-sell?

fields.name: Can_you_provide_a_couple_of_sentences_on_the_opportunity_use_case_stakeholders_p
fields.fieldText: Can you provide a couple of sentences on the opportunity? (use case, stakeholders, potential deal size, stage of opportunity, and anything else you think that would be appropriate to get buy in from the AWS AE)
fields.helpText: Feel free to paste a TLDR from your notes

validationRule.errorMessage: Please provide at least 50 characters for context for your deal

fields.name: Confirm_Cosell
fields.fieldText:
Confirmation of Submission


Thank you for submitting a new CoSell Request. A Partner Lead has been created and added to the Opportunity, and if you have any questions please reach out to Nick Wein in #partnerships.

fields.name: ConfirmProject_Partner
fields.fieldText:
Confirm Project and Partner Details

Please supply some additional information about the project you're working on with your prospect.

fields.name: Project_Information
fields.fieldText:
Opportunity Subtype: {!recordId.Subtype__c}

Estimated ARR: {!recordId.Forecast_Total_AR__c}

Target Close Date: {!recordId.CloseDate}

Selected Partner: {!partner_relationships.firstSelectedRow.Account__c}


(Note: if the above is inaccurate, please first review and update the opportunity, and restart this form)

fields.name: sales_act_cosell
fields.fieldText:
Sales Activity Definitions and Selection Help:

  • Initial discussions with customer
    • AE has engaged with the customer and has done initial discovery.
  • Customer has shown interest in Retool
    • Customer has indicated to the AE that Retool could be a good fit for their use case(s).
  • Conducted POC/Demo
    • AE and SE team have conducted a live product demo or POC for the customer to demonstrate product functionality and applicability to the customer's use case(s).
  • Evaluation/Planning Stage
    • AE and SE have discussed all relevant information with the customer related to the product and/or business use case(s). The customer is in the process of evaluating Retool for their use case(s) or planning how they might implement the solution in practice.
  • Agreed on Solution to Business Problem
    • Renewals or the customer has determined that Retool is a good fit for their use case(s).
  • Finalized Deployment Need
    • The customer has clearly outlined what is needed (e.g. technical resources, services, etc.) to move forward with a Retool deployment.

fields.name: Sales_Activity_CoSell
fields.fieldText: Sales Activity

fields.name: Would_you_like_the_Partner_s_help_with_the_CoSell_Opportunity
fields.fieldText: Would you like the Partner's help with the CoSell Opportunity?

fields.name: context_new_cosell
fields.fieldText: Can you provide a couple of sentences on the opportunity? (use case, stakeholders, potential deal size, stage of opportunity, and anything else you think that would be appropriate to get buy in from the Partner)
fields.helpText: Feel free to paste a TLDR from your notes

fields.name: ExistingACEOpportunityHeader
fields.fieldText:
Existing AWS Co-Sell Opportunity Submitted


It looks like there's an existing AWS-connected CoSell on this opportunity - no need to submit another one.


If you think this is in error, or that it is a separate co-sell necessary, please reach out to RevOps in #revops-data-quality on Slack.


If you have any additional questions about the Partner Lead, please reach out to Nick Wein in #partnerships.

fields.name: PL_Confirm
fields.fieldText:
Confirmation of Submission


Thank you for associating an existing Partner Lead with this opportunity. If you have any questions please reach out to Nick Wein in #partnerships.

fields.name: error_screen
fields.fieldText:
Error


A Partner Lead has not been associated or created on your opportunity. Please return to the previous screen and make a selection.

fields.name: help_message
fields.fieldText:
Additional Support Request Confirmation


The Partnerships Team will follow up with you directly to assist you in selecting the correct Partner and type.


Please reach out in #partnerships if you have any additional questions or concerns in the meantime.

fields.name: SDP_Reseller_Confirm
fields.fieldText:
Confirmation of Submission


Thank you for submitting a new Partner Request. For Reseller and Service Delivery Partners, the Partnerships Team will have to review and approve before the lead is generated.


The Partnerships Team will follow up with you directly if there are any additional questions. If you have any other questions, please reach out to them via Slack in #partnerships.

screens.name: Select_The_ACE_Opportunity_You_Would_Like_to_Associate
screens.label: Select The ACE Opportunity You Would Like to Associate

fields.name: ACE_Opp_Selection
fields.fieldText: Please select the ACE Opportunity you would like to associate with this deal.

fields.name: partner_type
fields.fieldText:
CoSell

﻿(SI and Consulting Agencies)

  • Co-selling is a sales motion where two or more peer-level partners with complementary offerings (technology or services) come together to provide a holistic solution to a shared customer need and work collaboratively to sell together.
    • Using current customer telemetry and future product directions, Partner will source partnerships that drive additional value for our customers, and enhance the value of the Retool platform via connectors, integrations, documentation, and demos.
  • Will typically qualify for a referral commission payout.

Reseller (please review our list of our authorized Reseller Partners)

  • Resellers help to accelerate indirect sales by removing purchasing impediments and assisting us in extending beyond our limited geographic footprint.
  • Retool services are discounted to the client who is purchasing through the Reseller.

Service Delivery

(ISV)

  • Typically reserved for Enterprise-level customers who are accustomed to purchasing software and services via large service delivery.
    • Partner will work with the customer to deliver custom solutions built on Retool.

fields.name: What_Kind_of_a_Partner_Are_You_Looking_For
fields.fieldText: What Kind of a Partner Are You Looking For?

fields.name: whatHelp
fields.fieldText: What type of partner interaction are you looking to submit?
